Literature.Title: Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Activity and Improved Stability of a D-Amino Acid Enantiomer of DMPC-10A, the Designed Derivative of Dermaseptin Truncates.
Literature.Author: Zai Y, Ying Y, Ye Z, Zhou M, Ma C, Shi Z, Chen X, Xi X, Chen T, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=512 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:<5% Killing=128 µM
